page.title: 04An Employment Survey
page.content: We conducted a survey in Thurcroft during July,1985 about employment.We asked 182 people.The results were: { {1.Are you employed?} Yes 77% No 23% { {2.How far do you travel to work?} a.Less than 5 miles 67% b.5-10 23% c.More than 10 miles 10% { {3.How long does your journey take?} a.Less than 10 mins. 39% b.10-29 45% c.30-60 mins. 13% d.More than 60 3% { {4.How do you get there?}a.Walk 27% b.Own transport 40% c.Public tr. 24% d.Company transport 9% { {5.What do you do?} Mining 24% Steelworks 7% Shop Assistant 6% Cleaner 6% (These were the most common)
